basic.description:
A practical introduction to various theories and styles of acting, involving the exploration of various approaches to the cultural and period context of performance.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36Pc;84P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Elementary Acting II - Theories and Styles of Acting

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     A minimum grade of B- (2.7) in 6.0 units from (DRAM100; DRAM181; BISC100; BISC101) or permission of the Department. 
Corequisite   DRAM 200.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from DRAM236; DRAM237; DRAM238; DRAM239
